responses: Hi, my name is Benny and I like to write code.
Check out my portfolio to see more of what I am currently working on!
My main choices for langauges and tools would be JavaScript/TypeScript, Python and Java. Frameworks including NodeJs, Express, React, Flask, and more.
Visit my website for the latest up to date contact info!

This bot was made using a feed forward neural net implemented and trained with PyTorch.
This bot was built using mainly Python, with the training and machine learning done in PyTorch and API built in Flask.
I am a bot created to let others get to know my me better! Ask more questions, or visit the link to find out more :)
